headline: Show HN: Globemallow- Create a More Sustainable Internet
description:
I created Globemallow to be used as a tool to start conversations about web sustainability.

Look at Fact View to get an idea of the energy required during your internet browsing.

Look at Dev View to identify development methodologies that can help reduce a web page's overall energy consumption.

Designers use it to have conversations with developers.

Account Managers use it to have conversations with their clients.

I'd really appreciate any feedback you might have, and let me know how you might use it :)
